TopicTitle: Laythecat is bestcat. (Chobit's house of madness) The one thread to rule them all!

Articles.Content: She was already, now she will just have more fans as the fans of this new fan art will find her fan art and become fans.
Fanception

Fanception

We definitely need to go deeper.

quick someone do fan art of my fan art and then it would be

my fan art's fan art brings more fan art fans into the fanart world of chobits fanart inspiring more fanart attracting more fans creating increasing unending cycle of fanart

But what happens if some makes a fan art of that fan art? Then that fan arts takes people to that fan art then to your fan art then to chobit's fan art? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? And fan art of that? the universe imploads due to overloading of fan art

Awesome, then the universe explodes into a universe made out of nothing but fan art.

yeah the universe would be composed of fanartinoes and fanartons in a fanartucleasu with fanartrons orbiting them
*wobbles around all swirly eyed* Please stop, my three brain cells are overheating!

be thankful i didn't go into fanartoretical fanics

new species, Fanartus Fanicus

new species, Fanartus Fanicus

dont go there and count darn you

I don't even

Can we stay off-topic in the off-topic area? This is starting to go on-topic.

You can't have on topic or off topic in the off topic as any on topic would automatically become off topic and any off topic would be on topic so you're stuck in a infinite loop. As a result there is no on or off topic, just The Topic.

A D B D?

(initiating reboot sequence)

You broke me!
Paradoxes can do that to people.

Paradoxes can do that to people.

Why...
Because I loving creating paradoxes for some reason. In fact, why don't you invent time travel and shoot your grandparents before your parent are born. The results are fun.

But then you never invented time travel, and couldn't go back to...

Oh I see what you did there. If we're lucky the unravelling of time-space will only affect our own galaxy.

Or Terry Prachett offers the idea that it would cause time to diverge, a trousers of time with the original in one leg and dimension and the alter in the other. You would be stuck the alternative though. This way both events happen.
